## Description

calculate spatial enrichment using the data.table implementation


## Usage

```r
calc_spatial_enrichment_DT(
  bin_matrix,
  spatial_network,
  calc_hub = F,
  hub_min_int = 3,
  group_size = "automatic",
  do_fisher_test = TRUE,
  adjust_method = "fdr",
  cores = NA
)
```
